page.title: 12SHOPPING
page.content: There are about 14 shops in Lenham. These vary from a Chinese Take-Away to a florists.The florist sells most flowers,especially roses,and they prepare the flowers for about 60 weddings a year. The Post Office sells stationery, stamps and sweets.Lurcocks and the V.G sell most goods including meat, cheese,pet food,freezer food and some medical supplies.The butchers shop provides an assortment of meats and the Home Bakers sells different sorts of bread and cakes. There is a Drug Store,3 hairdressers, a drapers and two banks one of which opens 2 days a week. The results from the interveiws show that 57% of households regularly go to Maidstone to do their food shopping. Only 12% of households do their food shopping locally.
